title: Can I study psychology after completing B.A in philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can go for psychology even after BA in Phylosophy. Few universities conduct entrance exam where as in few you can apply for direct admission. NIMHANS is conducted in February month by National Institute of Mental Health and Neurosciences Bangalore. LPUNEST is conducted by Lovely Professional University. You can do: MA Applied PsychologyMA Counselling PsychologyMA Hons. PsychologyMA Philosophy & Applied PsychologyMSc. PsychologyMsc Psychologocal CounsellingThe best Universities are:Delhi University (New Delhi)Jamia Milia Islamia (New Delhi)Ambedkar University (New Delhi)Lovely Professional University(Punjab)Banaras Hindu University (Varanasi)Aligarh Muslim University
Psychology should be the subject read at Graduate level to qualify for admission to Masters in Psychology.
